title: EPRI expands DCFlex data center initiative to nine demo sites across U.S. and Europe
description: EPRI announced six new DCFlex demonstration sites at DTECH 2026, totaling nine, to explore data centers' support for the electric grid.
content: EPRI announced six new DCFlex demonstration sites at DTECH 2026, totaling nine, to explore data centers' support for the electric grid.
